block.p: Dr. Macie Ellen Finkelstein, a daughter of Bette Finkelstein and Dr. Elliot Finkelstein of Chestnut Hill, Mass., was married last evening to Robert Mark Himmel, the son of Maida and Donald Himmel of Fort Lauderdale, Fla. Rabbi Donald Pollock officiated at the Pine Brook Country Club in Weston, Mass.

Dr. Finkelstein, 37, is an ophthalmologist, who practices with her father in Brookline, Mass. The bride, who will continue to use her name professionally, graduated from Yale University and received her medical degree from the University of Massachusetts at Worcester. Her father is a former president of the American Academy of Ophthalmology.

Dr. Macie Ellen Finkelstein, a daughter of Bette Finkelstein and Dr. Elliot Finkelstein of Chestnut Hill, Mass., was married last evening to Robert Mark Himmel, the son of Maida and Donald Himmel of Fort Lauderdale, Fla. Rabbi Donald Pollock officiated at the Pine Brook Country Club in Weston, Mass.

Dr. Finkelstein, 37, is an ophthalmologist, who practices with her father in Brookline, Mass. The bride, who will continue to use her name professionally, graduated from Yale University and received her medical degree from the University of Massachusetts at Worcester. Her father is a former president of the American Academy of Ophthalmology.

Mr. Himmel, 36, works in Lawrence, Mass., where he is the vice president in charge of the North American business unit of Malden Mills Industries, the manufacturer of Polartec fleece fabric. He graduated from the State University at Stony Brook, N.Y. His mother, who is retired, was the office manager for a group of ophthalmologists in New York. His father, also retired, was a vice president for sales at the Pezrow Company, a food brokerage in Ramsey, N.J.
The bridegroom's previous marriage ended in divorce.
